game.name: forever-happy-town
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A PvE multiplayer shooter where a prophecy of eight endless nights is rapidly approaching, are you good enough to keep the town forever happy? You'd better be, else a herd of lovely rabbits will require rapid relocation.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A PvE multiplayer shooter where a prophecy of eight endless nights is rapidly approaching, are you good enough to keep the town forever happy? You'd better be, else a herd of lovely rabbits will require rapid relocation.
